game.name: Shuwa Shuwa Guin!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wash, dry, and iron all the clothes in this cute and chaotic time management game to earn loads of money! In Shuwa Shuwa Guin, you are a penguin who inherited your grandfather's laundry business, and now you must work hard to keep it open!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wash, dry, and iron all the clothes in this cute and chaotic time management game to earn loads of money! In Shuwa Shuwa Guin, you are a penguin who inherited your grandfather's laundry business, and now you must work hard to keep it open!
